data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Changlang, Arunachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Changlang, Arunachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Changlang that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Changlang to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, fill the 6,400 souls living in the county of Changlang with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Changlang
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Changlang to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 6,400 citizens of Changlang, Arunachal Pradesh, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

location.name: Changlang
location.people_groups_list: Bania Brittal, Tai Taroi, Bilaspuri, Mahara, Assamese (Sikh traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania Brittal (52,000), Tai Taroi (2,100), Bilaspuri (1,100), Mahara (4,800), Assamese (Sikh traditions) (1,100)
